job.title: Software Engineer, Full Stack
job.description: at forge we know our team is our greatest asset as innovators in the private market our vision is to deliver a richer future for everyone we live that vision through our values of being bold humble and accountable we experience the value that our vision brings to the world every day helping the teams behind the greatest innovations of our generation from space travel to planetsaving plantbased nutrition and moreltbrgtltbrgtforge global is building the operating system for the private market innovation economy we have raised over million in venture capital to date and facilitated more than billion in private market transactions across over of the worlds most famous unicorn companies with companies staying private longer and longer we offer employees and founders financial freedom which also helps companies retain a happy team when an ipo may be an unknown number of years away whether through unlocking their ability to exercise stock options enabling them to leverage their hardearned equity or diversifying their portfolio to secure a strong financial future for themselves and their families forge is building innovative liquidity solutions for everyone involved in private companies todayltbrgtltbrgtneedless to say our ability to offer these powerful financial solutions has generated incredible interest from investors demand from customers and a need to grow our team to meet the needs of more companies teams and innovators in this wayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt the role ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtforges software engineering team is passionate about innovation and building scalable solutions that drive liquidity and growth in the private market our teams are leveraging a broad range of new technologies and are wellversed in delivering high quality innovative solutions we thrive on moving fast delivering value and living our values of being bold humble and accountableltbrgtltbrgtwere looking for engineers with ideally of a couple years of experience at a rapidly growing startup cutting edge teams at a larger tech company building systems and technology for financial services firms or a suggested one year of experience post coding bootcampltbrgtltbrgtwe are a full stack shop and our primary web applications are react ruby on rails all future development will be in ruby on railsltbrgtltbrgtforge is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and values diversity at our company we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status
